about_the_game:
The game is set in the alternate future of 9108. Québec City is celebrating its 7500th anniversary. The overpopulated metropolis of 900 millions inhabitants lives an idyllic, eccentric, but at the same time, dystopian lifestyle. Peace is about to end, though, as aliens, called the Tibestians, are now getting ready to wipe us out.

In this satirical and over-the-top action-RPG inspired from various 8-bit and 16-bit action and adventure games, you play the role of a reprogrammed Tibestian robot who is now friendly (although scary for locals) who has to go defeat his master, who has setup a robot-building factory North of the Harlaka District and is now threatening the human race. This game was made using RPG Maker 2003 and uses EasyRPG Player to run.

content_descriptors.notes: Foul language, sexual-related references, partial nudity, dark humor

detailed_description:
The game is set in the alternate future of 9108. Québec City is celebrating its 7500th anniversary. The overpopulated metropolis of 900 millions inhabitants lives an idyllic, eccentric, but at the same time, dystopian lifestyle. Peace is about to end, though, as aliens, called the Tibestians, are now getting ready to wipe us out.

In this satirical and over-the-top action-RPG inspired from various 8-bit and 16-bit action and adventure games, you play the role of a reprogrammed Tibestian robot who is now friendly (although scary for locals) who has to go defeat his master, who has setup a robot-building factory North of the Harlaka District and is now threatening the human race. This game was made using RPG Maker 2003 and uses EasyRPG Player to run.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X® 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel®
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6770M 512 Mo
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Superstar Hero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

dejus.descriptors:

short_description: A satirical action-RPG set in a alternate futuristic dystopian Quebec City. You are an enemy robot reprogrammed to be friendly and you are now forced to save the world against your very creator.
